item.description:
Christy and Adam Coppola are on a personal mission to see all 50 states on a bicycle in 2011.  They're travelling on self-contained touring bicycles, raising funds for World Bicycle Relief and Achilles International.

Come to an evening at McFadden's, no charge for entry, and listen to them talk about their travels, their charities, what they find to be the challenges and rewards.
item.how_to_find_us: The event will be in the private room. I'll the greeter and MC...8)
item.why: Two people are planning to bicycle in all 50 states in one year. Rhode Island will be state #26 on Adam and Christy Coppola's trip, and they'll be talking about the where's and why's of their journey.
item.name: Give A Bike: 50 State Tour visits Rhode Island
